title: Looking for Silver support, that wants to climb.
body:
Just want to duo with a support that's keen to climb, I mainly play Lucian and Kalista.

IGN: Rossofter

replies.body: Gold last 2 seasons, Somereason ended up in Silver IV this year.. Currently in SII need a Good ADC can play any and all supports. Mains tho: {{champion:201}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}}

currently s3.. im a jungle/support main so would like to duo w u
https://discord.gg/9vMT2DD

support main, I do pretty well when the rest of the map doesn't monkey out but I have terrible luck with team mates so any sane person in games would be appreciated, and all of my supports except for brand and thresh are above or well-above 50% wr
